packageName: Rain Bird LNK/LNK2 WiFi Module Controller
author: Marc Hedish
releaseNotes:
Release Candidate 0.1.2.1 — hybrid/modern firmware convergence (2.1 → 2.9 → 3.2), deterministic refresh, adaptive time sync, Switch/Valve support, and enhanced telemetry.

0.1.1.0 – Added links to GitHub README.md and Attribute documentation.
0.1.2.0 – Updated getRainSensorState() to reflect 'unknown' when on legacy (≤3.0) firmware.
0.1.2.1 – Updated documentation tile.

drivers.name: Rain Bird LNK WiFi Module Controller
